creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Head shawl, fine white cotton, thickly embroidered with poplar (?) leaves in red silk in long satin stitch, the stems in green chain stitch. Narrow border around entire shawl of the same, flanked by yellow couched black silk floss. Wide cotton border at each end divided into compartments carrying formalized red and green trees. Three vertical seams.
title: Woman's wedding veil (Abochhini)
